marge.middleware.listener.view

Class TikitagEventView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • marge.middleware.listener.view.TikitagEventView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, IView

    public class TikitagEventView
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements IView, java.io.Serializable
    This class is an User Interface that demonstrates for Publish/Subscribe model
    This is an JFrame and an implementation of IView
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    btdiem
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TikitagEventView(IListener model)
      The view is a JTabbedPane with 2 Tabs (2 JComponent
      The first tab is event table that updated real time events
      The second one is data table that is reported by system
      At the end of JTabbedPane is a JTextArea that shows the information of event more detail

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addReaderNode(ReaderEvent event)
      Create a reader node with parent is root
      If event of reader has extra information, add them as leaf node of reader node
      void addTagNode(TagEvent event)
      Find its ReaderId parent node that has the same ReaderId.getUid() with TagEvent#getClientId()#getUID(ReaderId)
      Add data of a TagEvent to JTree
      Transform data from Hexcimal to String
      javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode findChildNode(javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode parent, java.lang.String childName)
      This method will find a child node from a parent node
      Iterate the child collection of parent node
      If one of child of this collection has DefaultMutableTreeNode.getUserObject() is name of node
      Return that node, otherwise return null if could not find any
      java.lang.String getSerialNumber(com.tikitag.ons.model.util.ReaderId readerId)
      Normalize the data of ReaderId.getSerialNr() of ReaderId
      java.lang.String getTagId(com.tikitag.ons.model.util.TagId tagId)
      Normalize the data of TagId.getIdentifier()
      java.lang.String getUID(com.tikitag.ons.model.util.ReaderId readerId)
      Normalize the ReaderId.getUid() data of ReaderId
      void listen()
      This method will display the IView
      IView start listening to IListener system and update the received event and data of Tikitag reader and Tkitag tah
      javax.swing.JComponent makeEventTablePanel()
      Create a JPanel that contains a JTable and a JTextArea
      JTable displays events at the real time reported by IListener
      Meanwhile JTextArea display the data of event of Reader and PollResponse.Tag in more detail
      javax.swing.JComponent makeReaderTagPanel()
      create a JPanel that contains JTree
      Root node is your computer name
      Child node of root is ReaderId and its data such as ReaderId.getSerialNr()
      Child nodes of reader node are PollResponse.Tag and its data
      Data of Tikitag tag are an URL that is stored in Heximal format
      void removeReaderTagNode(java.lang.String parent, java.lang.String node)
      This method will remove a node out the Tree data
      If parent node is root, remove all of child for root node
      If parent node is not root, iterate the tree to find DefaultMutableTreeNode parent node,
      Then, iterate the child list of parent node to find deleted node
      Delete it and update DefaultTreeModel
      void update(java.util.Observable arg0, java.lang.Object arg1)
      The event is automatically notified to View by using Observer model
      The view will register itself with IListener as an Observer and wait a change notification from IEvent attaches the event and reader/tag data
      So it depends on specific implementation View, which data will be displayed
      void updateDescription(int selectedRow)
      When user selects one row on event JTable, the event information is displayed in JTextArea
      The number of events will updated on the title of JTabbedPane
      void updateEventTable(IEvent event)
      Receiving the Notification from IListener
      Parsing IEvent and update TableModel
      void updateReaderTagData(IEvent event)
      There are 2 cases: IEvent is realization of ReaderEvent
      Or IEvent is realization of TagEvent
      When there is ReaderEvent.ReaderEventType.READER_ADDED, an new reader is added to JTree
      When there is a ReaderEvent.ReaderEventType.READER_REMOVED, remove it out JTree
      When there is a TagEvent.TagEventType.PUT, a new Tag is added to JTree
      Whene there is a TagEvent.TagEventType.REMOVE, remove it out JTree

    • Constructor Detail

      • TikitagEventView

        public TikitagEventView(IListener model)
        The view is a JTabbedPane with 2 Tabs (2 JComponent
        The first tab is event table that updated real time events
        The second one is data table that is reported by system
        At the end of JTabbedPane is a JTextArea that shows the information of event more detail
        Parameters:
        model - -

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable arg0,
          java.lang.Object arg1)
        The event is automatically notified to View by using Observer model
        The view will register itself with IListener as an Observer and wait a change notification from IEvent attaches the event and reader/tag data
        So it depends on specific implementation View, which data will be displayed
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        arg0 - - IListener
        arg1 - - IEvent

        Parsing IEvent and update TableModel
        Parameters:

      • listen

        public void listen()
        Description copied from interface: IView
        This method will display the IView
        IView start listening to IListener system and update the received event and data of Tikitag reader and Tkitag tah
        Specified by:
        listen in interface IView

      • makeEventTablePanel

        public javax.swing.JComponent makeEventTablePanel()
        Create a JPanel that contains a JTable and a JTextArea
        JTable displays events at the real time reported by IListener
        Meanwhile JTextArea display the data of event of Reader and PollResponse.Tag in more detail
        Returns:
        a JComponent

      • makeReaderTagPanel

        public javax.swing.JComponent makeReaderTagPanel()
        create a JPanel that contains JTree
        Root node is your computer name
        Child node of root is ReaderId and its data such as ReaderId.getSerialNr()
        Child nodes of reader node are PollResponse.Tag and its data
        Data of Tikitag tag are an URL that is stored in Heximal format
        Returns:
        JComponent
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException

      • updateReaderTagData

        public void updateReaderTagData(IEvent event)
        There are 2 cases: IEvent is realization of ReaderEvent
        Or IEvent is realization of TagEvent
        When there is ReaderEvent.ReaderEventType.READER_ADDED, an new reader is added to JTree
        When there is a ReaderEvent.ReaderEventType.READER_REMOVED, remove it out JTree
        When there is a TagEvent.TagEventType.PUT, a new Tag is added to JTree
        Whene there is a TagEvent.TagEventType.REMOVE, remove it out JTree
        Parameters:
        event - - IEvent

      • updateDescription

        public void updateDescription(int selectedRow)
        When user selects one row on event JTable, the event information is displayed in JTextArea
        The number of events will updated on the title of JTabbedPane
        Parameters:
        selectedRow - - Integer

      • addReaderNode

        public void addReaderNode(ReaderEvent event)
        Create a reader node with parent is root
        If event of reader has extra information, add them as leaf node of reader node
        Parameters:
        event - - ReaderEvent

      • addTagNode

        public void addTagNode(TagEvent event)
        Find its ReaderId parent node that has the same ReaderId.getUid() with TagEvent#getClientId()#getUID(ReaderId)
        Add data of a TagEvent to JTree
        Transform data from Hexcimal to String
        Parameters:
        event - - IEvent

      • removeReaderTagNode

        public void removeReaderTagNode(java.lang.String parent,
                       java.lang.String node)
        This method will remove a node out the Tree data
        If parent node is root, remove all of child for root node
        If parent node is not root, iterate the tree to find DefaultMutableTreeNode parent node,
        Then, iterate the child list of parent node to find deleted node
        Delete it and update DefaultTreeModel
        Parameters:
        id - - is TagId.getIdentifier() or ReaderId.getUid()

      • findChildNode

        public javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode findChildNode(javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode parent,
                                                    java.lang.String childName)
        This method will find a child node from a parent node
        Iterate the child collection of parent node
        If one of child of this collection has DefaultMutableTreeNode.getUserObject() is name of node
        Return that node, otherwise return null if could not find any
        Parameters:
        parent - - DefaultMutableTreeNode
        childName - - String
        Returns:
        DefaultMutableTreeNode or null
